ygData.subject: Re: Sequel?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi, Ninja, The basic story is that while we still work on the code when we can, two of our team members moved to the Blizzard North company, and are
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 40
Message-ID: <17248.40.115.959279670@...>
Date: Sat, 07 Aug 1999 19:02:31 -0400
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: Sequel?


>From: Ninja X <ninjaboy@...>
>
>I was wondering if Gladiator: Beyond Freedom was ever released.  The
>alpha version link at www.fsgames.com is broken.  The graphics look
>awesome, but I have yet to see how well it runs.  Any help would be
>very much appreciated.
>          ~ Ninja X ~

Hi, Ninja,

The basic story is that while we still work on the code when we can, two of 
our team members moved to the Blizzard North company, and are working on 
the Diablo 2 game, which is to be released this fall.  While we're very 
happy they're doing this (D2 looks like it will be a wonderful game!), this 
means that we as a group haven't had time to work on it, so it's sat sadly 
at the second alpha stage for many months now :(

I've had other reports that the link is broken, and I'll go try to fix 
that.  I keep meaning to do this, and keep forgetting..

--Tom
